en16931

Class Validex

  • java.lang.Object
    • en16931.Validex

  • public class Validex
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to validate an Invoice in EN16931 format using the online service validex.net. You need an user and a REST API key to be able to use this feature.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Validex(java.lang.String userId, java.lang.String apiKey, Invoice invoice) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isValidatValidex()
      Validates the XML representation of the invoice using validex.net

      • Validex

        public Validex(java.lang.String userId,
               java.lang.String apiKey,
               Invoice invoice)
        Parameters:
        userId - your user id at validex.net
        apiKey - the REST API key for your user
